Text.val: 12.06.2006 AK SCR11451 pi.DATEFROM and pi.DATEUNTIL are mandatory also pi.OPTION =2
29.05.2006 AK SCR11346 change implementation of dates in direct SQL
-- Uses to switch system language to the English language (=report language) and
back to user language if report is created
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- Get user language, uses to switch back to user language if report was produce
-- report has to be printed in GNRL_LANGUAGE
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)

STP.TXT: E R R O R : W R O N G P A R A M E T E R S OR C L I E N T D O N O T E X I S T

Text.val: -- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Switch system language to 'GB', in which report has to be produced
-- Switch system language back to user language
-- Textfields which used in BXA701A for the report heading 1 lines
Get REPA_JOURNALNO (uses also to build the XML file names)
-- Build filename for temporary XML Files
-- Build final filename for the XML File
BXA701B Print lines on the report
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523 (36)

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select DEBC_ADMNO, DEBC_CLNTNO, DEBC_DEBC, case when DEBC_NAME='' then concat(DEBH_HADR_NAME1,DEBH_HADR_NAME2) else DEBC_NAME end, case when DEBC_CITY='' then DEBH_HADR_CITY else DEBC_CITY end, DEBB_ACTINVAC, INVO_INVOICENO, INVO_INVDATE, INVO_DUEDATE, INVO_CURRENCY, INVO_AACTUALI, INVO_NO from :1/DEBB join :1/DEBC on DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO join :1/DEBH on DEBC_DEBH = DEBH_NO join :1/INVO on INVO_DEBC_NO = DEBB_DEBC_NO and INVO_AACTUALI<>0 and (INVO_VALUEDATE >= ':2' :7) and (INVO_VALUEDATE<=':3' :7) and INVO_MARKCODESPEC <> 9 and INVO_MARKCODESPEC <> 47 and INVO_SPECAGEINGREMARK = :4 where DEBB_ACTINVAH>0 and DEBC_ADMNO=:5 and DEBC_CLNTNO=:6
order by DEBC_DEBC_SORT
